## Slot class

Set of user typed values, consumed at any flow that requires this feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Slot<Type extends Registry<any>, ProvidedFrom extends EnvVisibility> extends FeatureInput<Type, ProvidedFrom>
```

<b>Extends:</b> [FeatureInput](./engine-core.featureinput.md)<!-- -->&lt;Type, ProvidedFrom&gt;

## Example

Slot.withType<IUser>().defineEntity('main')
